description: The name of each officer and/or staff member of the City of Oakland with whom a lobbyist made a contact. Contacts of public officials are disclosed by lobbyists registered with the Public Ethics Commission on a quarterly basis in compliance with the registered Lobbyist Act. This dataset is updated weekly.

name: 2013 Lobbyist Activity - Contacts of Public Officials and City Staff
